component.name: Insync
component.summary: Google Drive, OneDrive and Dropbox syncing

p.em: You will need a paid license to use Insync.

description.p: Manage your Google Drive, OneDrive, and Dropbox files straight from your Desktop
With Insync, you can now sync, edit, and share files without opening a million browser tabs
This flatpak is maintained by the Flathub community, and is not necessarily endorsed or officially maintained by the upstream developers.
